contentList.content: Is there something you need, my friend?
You... afraid? I find that quite difficult to believe, considering you're the first to charge into danger, ever the hero.
And they say I'm the grumpy one. Please, continue.
Oh! Gods, really? I mean, yes, of course!
A celebration sounds fitting! We'll begin making preparations.
There is something I wanted to ask you before, but I was afraid-
I was afraid of appearing greedy, as you once said, but I don't give a damn anymore.
Are you quite done? I've other places to be... "hero" things to do.
I'd like to spend some time together one evening... just the two of us. What do you think?
It's a date, then. I'll visit again one evening soon.
I have a proposal for the Master of Ramazith's Tower.
There's much to celebrate! How about I come over one evening soon?
I was imagining something more... private.
